p: Marital partnerships were assumed to form/dissolve at a specific rate with no polygamy. Marital rate (probability per unit time for a person to marry) was estimated using a mathematical model for partnership formation/dissolution and maximum likelihood applied to the current marriage age-specific prevalence in accordance with Demographic and Health Survey (DHS) data from Kenya [ 33]. Average marriage duration was set at 20 years, also according to DHS data from Kenya and other countries in SSA [ 33].
